name: Block Breaker (Linko)
description:
This is my first ever 2D game. It's a simple Block Breaker game I made as part of the "Learn to Code by Making Games" Udemy course.

Destroy all the blocks without dropping the ball to advance.

Your feedback is most welcome!

Update 8/1/16: Added a particle system to block destruction. Changed the color of the paddle to a "wood" color.

Note: Playing in full screen mode currently breaks mouse tracking.
